game.title: Rise Dash
game.instructions: Use UP ARROW to jump and SPACEBAR to shoot rice rockets!
game.startMessage: Press SPACE or UP ARROW to start
game.jumpMessage: UP ARROW to jump, SPACE to shoot rice rockets
game.restartMessage: Press SPACE or UP ARROW to restart

auth.welcomeSubtitle: The arcade game where every jump counts!
auth.connectWallet: Connect your wallet and prove you are the real player.
auth.siweStatement: Sign in to Rise Dash to prove you own this wallet.
